resources.string: please connect the i-sleep, then enter the ID on product
The next day you must open an alarm clock so that intelligent alarm clock in a suitable time to open an alarm clock
Reset the sleep debt will start calculating time of the current sleep debt to today, no record will be changed, this will only adjust the calculation method of the figure.

0-20 silence 
20-40 quiet 
40-60 talk in the room 
70-90 noise, nerve damage 
90-100 excessive noise, hearing impaired 
100-120 insufferable, deafening for one minute 
>120 deafness 
>300 irreversible deafness in the area 20 km
If the ambient noise is greater than your set of db, the system will inform you via cell phone number, give priority to the first cell phone number
If you dont use the current number,please timely to change

1. Food can help the baby fall asleep. 
Tryptophan is a natural amino acid guided sleep, it can increase the melatonin inside your body and vasoconstriction to adjust sleep cycle.It grows naturally in: 
●Cherry 
●Bananas 
●Figs 
Foods containing a large amount of fiber and calcium, or also can accelerate the release of the protein in the brain of these elements 
Dairy products : milk , cheese , lactic acid (infants within two years old should not be fed by fresh milk ) 
●Whole wheat : bread, cereal grains 
●Rice, oats 
●Seeds : sesame, sunflower seeds, flaxseed ( granular foods , pay attention to the swallowing of the baby) 
●Nuts : hazelnuts, peanuts, walnuts ( granular foods , pay attention to the swallowing of the baby) 
●Beans 
●Protein : eggs, white meat , peanut butter (to be careful the intake of eggs should not be overdose ) 
●Fish: Sand Man , halibut , tuna 
●Calcium -rich: kale 
●Magnesium rich : American almonds ( granular foods , pay attention to the swallowing of the baby) 
Snack ideas : 
●Tryptophan takes an hour to reach the brain , so do not eat before going to bed ! 
●Milk and whole grains ( whole wheat sugar, infants within two years old should not be fed by fresh milk ) 
●Whole-wheat peanut butter sandwich 
●Milk with oatmeal or cookies (infants within two years old should not be fed by fresh milk ) 
●Lactate plus nuts ( granular foods , pay attention to the swallowing of the baby) 
Snack menue 
Whole-wheat peanut butter sandwich 
Ingredients: a package of whole wheat bread, a jar of peanut butter. 
Approach: Take two whole wheat bread, rubbed a teaspoon in a peanut butter, cover with another piece, then you can eat immediately 
Milk cereal porridge 
Ingredients: milk, cereal, water 
Practice: 1、 Cereal plus suit amount of water and soak for 30 minutes or more, 
2、 Set the pan on fire, pour cereal soup, simmer about 20 minutes, add the milk, mix well and cook for 15 minutes, stir ,then you can eat immediately 
●Lotus lily porridge 
Ingredients: lotus 30 grams, lily 15 grams, rice 60 grams , rock sugar 30 grams. 
Method: Wash the lily, cut them into small pieces, peeled lotus heart, wash the rice; inside the pot, add water,lotus seeds, rice and cook together; cooked join lily, sugar, then cook until melted. 
Avoid: 
●Caffeine: Coffee, chocolate, cocoa, tea 
●Junk food or processed fiber 
●Fat greasy or spicy foods 
●Alcohol, nicotine

①、 Proper sleep environment ----- Generally after 8pm, do not amuse your baby, let them go to sleep early , turn down or turn off the TV, keep quiet, you can properly put some music, or sing a lullaby to him. 
②、Know the difference between night and day ------ at night,one or two hours before baby going to sleep, dim the light of the room, when baby slept, turn off all the lights. Do not make the outside transparent or pass into the noisy sound. By the contrast of bright and dark,allow the baby to learn the distinction of day and night, awake and asleep. 
③、Ask your baby to sleep regularly------mom and dad need to find the baby’s own sleep patterns, and then tailored toyour baby’s sleep schedule, you can observe different times of sleeping,waking mental state, and then follow the baby’s best condition to make adjustments 
④、Obey the habit of baby’s trick----coax baby to go to sleep ,pay attention to some of the habits of the little trick of your baby . Find out their sleeping habits and obey them,it’s easy to coax the them to fall asleep 
⑤、Limit Leisure time ---- close to sleeping time at night,do not go out. You can play quiet games with baby, such as appropriately give him some small toy boxes, rattles, rubber toys, or listen to soothing music, obsessed with songs, when found them a little tired, feeding on them quickly ,baby will fall asleep when sucking. 
⑥、Bath aid sleep ---- observed your baby’s mental state, if you feel them a little sleepy , you can give your baby a warm bath, directly put them in bed after washing, give them some milk, then turn off the room lights and lying in bed together, pat their back, they will fall asleep soon . 
Tips: The above method is according to the baby’s age, check which works best for your baby

• Crib, preferably with a mosquito net above the bed --- Do not stack objects, to prevent items falling by accident 
·Surrounded crib baby with bumps ----- Prevent baby bumps 
• Mattress ------ moderate hardness 
• Cotton quilt, cover is also removable 
• Nightlights ------ prevent the baby wakes up at night, turn on the lights will not irritate baby 
• Bedside bell --- music can soothe your baby’s mood 
• Changing mat, baby diapers ------ prevent diaper needs at nighttime 
 Baby sleep hygiene principles: 
• Adhere to baby’s rule of normal schedule 
• Be quiet sleep environment, avoid light interference 
• Room temperature need to be kept at a relatively stable temperature and humidity, room temperature should avoid overheating. 
·Strict implementation of sleep, wake up time, strengthen the training of circadian cycle. 
• Avoid hunger before going to bed, do not drinking too much when you go to bed at night , so as not to disturb sleep. 
• Baby had better sleep alone, studies have shown that sleep alone than sharing with mother helps sleep better. 
• One or two hours before bedtime, avoid strenuous activity or too excited. 
• When baby wake up at night, the general is beginning whines, try to coax the baby to sleep. But once the baby crying angry, it is likely the baby is really hungry, you can feed your baby some milk and then make them fall asleep. Do not go to coax them, it will cause the baby’s dependency.

Newborn spend most of they time in sleeping, one day a total sleep time is about 18 to 22 hours. As the baby grew older, their sleep time will be gradually reduced. sleep time of 2-5 months years order baby is roughly 15 to 18 hours, sleep time of 6 to 12 months years order baby is roughly 14 to 16 hours, sleep time of 3 years old baby sleep is roughly 10 to 12 hours.

The researchers found that the intellectual of baby who used to tummy sleeping develops faster, but the baby who lying down catch up with tummy sleeping baby slowly .It is recommended that baby following five months who can not turn over to sleep lying down, until after five months later can be freely tummy sleeping. 
Benefits of tummy sleeping:① the fetus in the mother’s womb is abdomen inward, outward curled back position, this position is the most natural posture of self-protection, so the baby feels more secure, easier to sleep cooked, easily awakened when tummy sleeping, it also does good to the nervous system development of the baby 
②Tummy sleeping can make your baby upright, exercise neck, chest, back and limbs and other large muscle groups, promote the development of the baby’s muscle tone. tummy sleeping can prevent back flow into the esophagus and the stomach caused by vomiting and choking the mouth, eliminate flatulence 
③ The capacity of baby’s stomach is small, not bending enough, with contraction of the cardiac portion is weak, so that it is extremely common phenomenon to discharge. baby milk.Cardia stomach near the middle, when the body is lifted tummy cardia can prevent spits. Even then spits occur due to face down, you will not be inhalation of vomit trachea and cause suffocation 
④ Tummy sleeping, chest pressure, bed reaction can promote the development of cardio. Infants under 2 months has been able to rise, as the child limb development, they can begin to separate, random limb movement. Tummy sleeping is more conducive to physical exercise. From the beginning to the rise of the two wrist support can enhance muscle strength, wrists, arms and back and other items. Meanwhile kids through their own efforts to do all kinds of things whatever is conducive to the development of independent, self-reliance spirit 
⑤ Baby who are not suitable for tummy sleeping

① Gently patted him on the back can help your baby fall asleep, avoid shaking hug. Baby who keep crying and do not want to go sleep, you can sit by his bed side, holding his hands until he fell asleep. A few days later, you keep certain distance with the baby, let him see you, stay a short time later, let the baby sleep alone adapt slowly 
② Try not to turn on the lights at night, when feeding or changing diapers, you can open the small lamp lights beside immediately after it’s happened, the baby’s ability to regulate the surrounding environment is poor, if the light in the room keep on on all night, changing the body to adapt to day and night, it will affect the secretion of growth hormone peak in the night, so that height growth will be slower. Night lights also cause decreased secretion of melatonin, easily awakened. As noted in the survey, baby used to sleep with lights turned on, the incidence of myopia is up to 40% 
③ Let your baby fall asleep as soon as possible every day, long-term adherence can develop a good habit of going to bed early. Since the peak of growth hormone secretion is during the night of 22 to 24 points, if sleep late, the secretion of growth hormone in the body of the baby is bound to reduce ,the height will be affected; sleep later can also cause lack of sleep, affecting normal life. Therefore, you should lead by example, train your baby of good habits to go to bed and get up early. Baby suffering from congenital heart disease, congenital stridor, pneumonia, cough, sputum when cold, cerebral palsy, bloating and some sick babies, such as whom suffering from congenital hypertrophic pyloric stenosis, duodenal obstruction, Hirschsprung colon disease, meconium obstruction, necrotizing enterocolitis, intussusception and other issues such as ascites, blood cancer, kidney disease and other diseases of the abdominal mass 
④ Baby who are suitable for tummy sleeping Suffering from gastroesophageal reflux, obstructive respiratory abnormalities, torticollis and other baby, you can try tummy sleeping to help alleviate the condition. Baby with small chin, large tongue, vomiting,, must tummy sleeping . Another condition to pay special attention is when children have phlegm, often vomiting, vomiting once, let the children get on the ground, put out of the food before lying down again, otherwise will lead to suffocation. easily

Put yourself thinking for the baby, of course,it is better to nestle in her mother’s arms, the smell of mom familiar taste, listening to her mother’s heartbeat and breathing rhythm, the author of Attachment Parenting Encyclopedia Dr. Sears recommends parents to learn from Oriental Western parents the more natural primitive kind of intimate parenting. Among them, sleep together with your baby ,fedding with breast milk pro, hunging them on the back, such as a timely response to the baby’s needs is as important as intimate parenting methods. Of course, he also stressed the need for each family to find a suitable form of sleep, the key is to find the best approach to make mother and baby sleep well \nSears physician said, one day the child will choose to sleep alone, while those wonderful childhood experience and dependent parents will become one of the best memories of his life. I can’t agree more, when I was a kid ,i feel particularly happy to sleep togethe with my parents. With this theoretical background and practical summary backing, the so-called argument small bed to sleep more cultured independence should be forgetton.

A suitable pillow, can not only make a perfect baby head shape, but also promote physical health and development. How to choose and use a pillow, naturally became the babys top priority. Mom in the choice of pillows, should pay attention to the height, width, length, but also the pillowcases, pillow materials and hardness, and so on. Width equal to the width of babys shoulders is appropriate, or slightly wider; the height of three or four months baby is 1-2cm; after 6 months one is about 3-4cm; 3 years older one is about 6-9cm. 
Newborn babies dont usually need to use pillow, because the head size of newborn is almost equal to shoulder width. Lie on your back, back and head on the same plane; Side, head and body are in the same plane. But if the mattress is very soft , when the day is cold, you go to sleep or spilled milk, mother can fold in half twice of the towel , pad at the bottom of the babys head. Or let the baby lie on their right side, and use the upper part of the folded towel to pad slightly higher 
When little babies grow up to three months or so, learned to look upward, after that physiological cervical spine appears bent forward. At this time it is more appropriate to start using a pillow. However, there are many babies , often unwittingly put the pillow aside, did not even prepared to spend a small pillow. 1 year old baby with big head , the degree of curvature of the spine is not deep, as long as your baby does not feel uncomfortable, no pillow does not matter. But with the development of the body, the childs shoulders gradually widened. In order to protect the normal physiological curvature, while maintaining normal physiological activity of sleep, should better use a pillow. A good pillow can be a good support cervical spine. Without it, the quality of sleep will be greatly reduced 
The pillow for baby, whether it needs to be harder or softer? Some moms prefer a slightly harder pillow, thought it would help the babys skull to grow strong, owning a good looking head shape , but this is not correct.Hard pillow may make the neck muscle fatigue, resulting neck stiffness. And babys skull is soft, chimney and skull line is not closed completely,after a long time use, it will cause skull deformity or face size,change beautiful appearance. Too soft pillow, though,will not well support cervical vertebra, and since the contact area with the babys scalp is too large, go against haemal circulation, poor permeability, even breathing, especially when the baby has a fever . So baby pillow should be moderate, if mother makes the pillow core herself, might as well choose buckwheat husk, rapeseed, such as green tea,chrysanthemum materials as fillers.
